document_data.name: Iskra
document_data.mainbody: '''Iskra''' was [[Auril]]'s [[roc]] mount during the years of the [[Everlasting Rime]].
document_data.Possessions: Stashed throughout the roc's nest were a [[silver dragon]] egg, an exotic wooden [[harp]] decorated with [[ivory]] and [[zircon]], and an [[electrum]] chain with a pendant of [[bloodstone]]. It also included a chest containing [[currency|gold pieces]], a [[gold]]en ring with a black [[pearl]], and a ''[[spell scroll]]'' featuring ''[[mass cure wounds]]''.
document_data.History:
In order to maintain the Everlasting Rime, Auril needed to cast a nightly spell from Iskra's back.

Iskra had a number of hostile encounters with [[Angajuk]], which left the latter scarred.
